import React, { useState } from 'react'; function Task(){ const [image, setImage] = useState(""); const [tilte, setTitle] = useState(""); const [subtilte, setSubtitle] = useState(""); const [description, setDescription] = useState(""); const [dateP, setDateP] = useState(""); const [dateE, setDateE] = useState(""); const collectData = async (e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); var result = await fetch('http://localhost:8080/create', { method: 'post', body: JSON.stringify({image, tilte, subtilte, description, dateP, dateE}), header: {'content-Type' : 'application/json'}, }) result = await result.json; localStorage.setItem("Task", JSON.stringify(result)); } return (
setImage(e.target.value)} />
setTitle(e.target.value)}/>
setSubtitle(e.target.value)} />
